dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Vincent, you came so early. Hi, Yvonne! Have you been going to school together lately?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: We did come to school together recently because our homes are so close! haha.…

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I was just, uh, I mean, we don't go to school together every day, but we bumped into each other on the way to school today…

dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Um? I don’t believe what you said, hahaha.
